warnings.backdropFirefox: Firefox users need to enable "gfx.webrender.all" and "layout.css.backdrop-filter.enabled" by going to the "about:config" URL. Restart Firefox after enabling the two flags.
warnings.unusedGlobal: Release the unused global shortcut keys
warnings.selectTooltip: Select preferred video for media hotkeys. Useful if you want to control background music from a different tab (or from another program with global hotkeys).
warnings.sliderTooltip: â‡§ hold shift key for precise control.

fxPanel.queryTooltip: CSS selector used to find elements to filter. For example, 'video, img' will select both videos and images. For advanced usage, view documentation online about CSS selectors.

command.toggleLoopTooltip: Repeat the video from the marked position to the current position.

flags.languageTooltip: All languages except English were translated using online tools.
flags.pinByDefaultTooltip: New tabs will automatically be pinned.
flags.hideBadgeTooltip: The badge is the text on the extension icon.
flags.ghostModeTooltip: Try to block website from changing speed. Disabled by default because it might break some websites.
flags.inheritGlobalTooltip: New tab's can inherit from the global context or the previous tab's context?

editor.toggleMode: You can use local or global shortcut keys.
editor.toggleModeTooltip: Global shortcuts are useful when you want to control video or audio while using another program.
editor.greedyMode: Will try to block event propagation and default behaviors.

rules.ILO: Only check during the initial page load.
